00021 /* ioctl data struct */
00022 typedef struct {
00023  unsigned int  chan;  /* channel 0/1 */
00024  unsigned  char  stat,   /* status register */ 
00025       address;  /* address register */
00026     int  data;       
00027 } pscip_t;
00028 
00029 
00030 
00031 /* ioctl fpga data struct */
00032 typedef struct {
00033   unsigned int channel;  /* channel 0/1 */  
00034   unsigned short high_data,
00035                 mid_data,
00036                 low_data;
00037 } pscip_fpga_t;
00038 
00039 /* ioctl stats data struct */
00040 typedef struct {  
00041   unsigned int channel;  /* channel 0/1 */ 
00042   unsigned int rx, /* rx successful counter */
00043               tx, /* tx successful counter */
00044               err_flag, /* global status error flag */
00045         link_err_flag[5], /* link error flag (status) */
00046         cntrl_stat, /* controller status */        
00047         linkdown_cnt,
00048         txerr_cnt;
00049         
00050 } pscip_stats_t;

00052 
00053 /*
00054  * Channel Status Register BitMasks (base+0,base+8,base+16...) (read/write)
00055  */
00056 #define PSCIP_WRITEREAD_MODE_MSK  0x80 /* 1=write cycle; 0=read cycle (w/r)*/
00057 #define PSCIP_ECHO_MSK            0x40 /* 1=write echo/send of requested data; 0=write cycle/read request (w/r) */
00058 #define PSCIP_INPUTBUF_MSK        0x20 /* 1=buffer full; 0=buffer not full (r) */
00059 #define PSCIP_DSP_MSK             0x10 /* 1=dsp stopped; 0=dsp running (r) */
00060 #define PSCIP_REMLOC_MSK          0x8  /* 1=local control; 0=remote control (r) */
00061 #define PSCIP_LINK_MSK            0x4  /* 1=link down; 0=link up (r) */
00062 
00063 /*
00064  * Status Register BitMasks (base+56) (read only)
00065  */
00066 #define PSCIP_ERROR_MSK        0x8000  /* 1=error; 0=ok */
00067 #define PSCIP_RDWAVE_BUSY_MSK  0x10    /* 1=ready; 0=busy */
00068 #define PSCIP_WRWAVE_BUSY_MSK  0x8     /* 1=ready; 0=busy */
00069 #define PSCIP_READ_BUSY_MSK    0x4     /* 1=ready; 0=busy */
00070 #define PSCIP_WRITE_BUSY_MSK   0x2     /* 1=ready; 0=busy */
00071 #define PSCIP_SETCUR_BUSY_MSK  0x1     /* 1=ready; 0=busy */
00072 
00073 /*
00074  * FPGA Status Register BitMasks (base+48) (write only)
00075  */
00076 #define PSCIP_ERRCLEAR_MSK    0x8000   /* 1=clear counter; 0=don't care */
00077 #define PSCIP_SETLOOP_MSK     0x1      /* 1=set loopback mode on; 0=set loopback mode off */
00078 
00079 /*
00080  * FPGA Status Register BitMasks (base+48)=high (read only)
00081  */
00082 /* bits 15..8 */ 
00083 #define PSCIP_ERRCNT_MSK      0x8000   /* error counter */
00084 #define PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK    0x80     /* 1=link error; 0=link ok */
00085 #define PSCIP_TXERR_MSK       0x40     /* 1=tx error; 0=tx ok */
00086 #define PSCIP_LOOPBACK_MSK    0x1      /* 1=loopback mode on; 0=loopback mode off */
00087 
00088 /*
00089  * FPGA Status Register BitMasks (base+50)=mid (read only)
00090  */ 
00091 #define PSCIP_PAR_ERR_0_MSK      0x4000  /* 1=parity error on register 0; 0=ok */
00092 #define PSCIP_BREAK_ERR_0_MSK    0x2000  /* 1=break error on register 0; 0=ok */
00093 #define PSCIP_FRAME_ERR_0_MSK    0x1000  /* 1=frame error on register 0; 0=ok */
00094 #define PSCIP_COMP_ERR_0_MSK     0x800   /* 1=compare error on register 0; 0=ok */
00095 #define PSCIP_TIMEOUT_ERR_0_MSK  0x400   /* 1=timeout error on register 0; 0=ok */
00096 #define PSCIP_PAR_ERR_1_MSK      0x200   /* 1=parity error on register 1; 0=ok */
00097 #define PSCIP_BREAK_ERR_1_MSK    0x100   /* 1=break error on register 1; 0=ok */
00098 #define PSCIP_FRAME_ERR_1_MSK    0x80    /* 1=frame error on register 1; 0=ok */
00099 #define PSCIP_COMP_ERR_1_MSK     0x40    /* 1=compare error on register 1; 0=ok */
00100 #define PSCIP_TIMEOUT_ERR_1_MSK  0x20    /* 1=timeout error on register 1; 0=ok */
00101 #define PSCIP_PAR_ERR_2_MSK      0x10    /* 1=parity error on register 2; 0=ok */
00102 #define PSCIP_BREAK_ERR_2_MSK    0x8     /* 1=break error on register 2; 0=ok */
00103 #define PSCIP_FRAME_ERR_2_MSK    0x4     /* 1=frame error on register 2; 0=ok */
00104 #define PSCIP_COMP_ERR_2_MSK     0x2     /* 1=compare error on register 2; 0=ok */
00105 #define PSCIP_TIMEOUT_ERR_2_MSK  0x1     /* 1=timeout error on register 2; 0=ok */
00106 
00107 /*
00108  * FPGA Status Register BitMasks (base+52)=low (read only)
00109  */ 
00110 #define PSCIP_PAR_ERR_3_MSK      0x200   /* 1=parity error on register 3; 0=ok */
00111 #define PSCIP_BREAK_ERR_3_MSK    0x100   /* 1=break error on register 3; 0=ok */
00112 #define PSCIP_FRAME_ERR_3_MSK    0x80    /* 1=frame error on register 3; 0=ok */
00113 #define PSCIP_COMP_ERR_3_MSK     0x40    /* 1=compare error on register 3; 0=ok */
00114 #define PSCIP_TIMEOUT_ERR_3_MSK  0x20    /* 1=timeout error on register 3; 0=ok */
00115 #define PSCIP_PAR_ERR_4_MSK      0x10    /* 1=parity error on register 4; 0=ok */
00116 #define PSCIP_BREAK_ERR_4_MSK    0x8     /* 1=break error on register 4; 0=ok */
00117 #define PSCIP_FRAME_ERR_4_MSK    0x4     /* 1=frame error on register 4; 0=ok */
00118 #define PSCIP_COMP_ERR_4_MSK     0x2     /* 1=compare error on register 4; 0=ok */
00119 #define PSCIP_TIMEOUT_ERR_4_MSK  0x1     /* 1=timeout error on register 4; 0=ok */
00120 
00121 /* FPGA link error bitmask */
00122 #define PSCIP_PAR_ERR_MSK      0x10    /* 1=parity error; 0=ok */
00123 #define PSCIP_BREAK_ERR_MSK    0x8     /* 1=break error; 0=ok */
00124 #define PSCIP_FRAME_ERR_MSK    0x4     /* 1=frame error; 0=ok */
00125 #define PSCIP_COMP_ERR_MSK     0x2     /* 1=compare error; 0=ok */
00126 #define PSCIP_TIMEOUT_ERR_MSK  0x1     /* 1=timeout error; 0=ok */
00127 
00128 
00129 /*
00130  * Link identification
00131  */
00132 #define PSCIP_WRHPRIO_IDX    0    /* high priority write */ 
00133 #define PSCIP_WRITE_IDX      1    /* write */ 
00134 #define PSCIP_READ_IDX       2    /* read */ 
00135 #define PSCIP_WRWAVE_IDX     3    /* write waveform */
00136 #define PSCIP_RDWAVE_IDX     4    /* read waveform */
00137 
00138 #define PSCIP_LINKDOWN_TOUT  4    /* wait 4 second to give data after the link up again (previously was down) */
00139 /* 
00140  * Real-time thread status BitMask
00141  */
00142 #define PSCIP_THREAD_RUN_MSK      0x1   /* 1=thread running; 0=thread stopped */  
00143 #define PSCIP_THREAD_ERR_MSK      0x2   /* 1=thread errors; 0=thread ok */ 
00144 
00145 /*
00146  * Ioctl commands
00147  */
00148 #define PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC  0xB1B  
00149 #define PSCIP_WRHIPRIO     _IOW  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 1, pscip_t) /* high priority write */
00150 #define PSCIP_WRITE        _IOW  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 2, pscip_t) /* write */
00151 #define PSCIP_READ         _IOWR (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 3, pscip_t) /* read */
00152 #define PSCIP_WRWAVE       _IOW  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 4, pscip_t) /* write waveform */
00153 #define PSCIP_RDWAVE       _IOWR (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 5, pscip_t) /* read waveform */
00154 #define PSCIP_RDLINKSTAT   _IOWR  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC,6, pscip_t) /* read link status register */
00155 #define PSCIP_RDFPGASTAT   _IOR  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 7, pscip_fpga_t) /* read fpga registers */
00156 #define PSCIP_RDSTATISTICS _IOR  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 8, pscip_stats_t) /* read/write/errors statistics */
00157 //#define PSCIP_VMEADDR      _IOR  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 9, unsigned long) /* get pscip vmeaddr */
00158 #define PSCIP_PCIADDR      _IOR  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 9, unsigned long) /* get pscip vmeaddr */
00159 
00160 #define PSCIP_RESET        _IO  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 17)           /* reset IP module */
00161 
00162 //added functionality
00163 #define PSCIP_CLRCOUNTER        _IOW  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 18, pscip_t) 
00164 #define PSCIP_DUMPFPGAREGS        _IOW  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 19, pscip_t)           /* clear IP counter*/
00165 #define PSCIP_WRITEIPREG        _IOW  (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 10, pscip_t) /* read ip register */
00166 #define PSCIP_READIPREG         _IOWR (PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC, 11, pscip_t) /* write IP register */
00167 /* Error codes */
00168 #define PSCIP_ERR_OFFSET   PSCIP_IOCTL_MAGIC
00169 #define PSCIP_MISMATCH_ERR (PSCIP_ERR_OFFSET + 0)  /* Echo value doesn't match */
00170 #define PSCIP_REMLOC_ERR   (PSCIP_ERR_OFFSET + 1)  /* Remote control disabled */
00171 #define PSCIP_READ_ERR     (PSCIP_ERR_OFFSET + 2)  /* Generic reading error */
00172 #define PSCIP_TOUT_ERR     (PSCIP_ERR_OFFSET + 3)  /* Reading timeout error */
00173 #define PSCIP_BUFFER_ERR   (PSCIP_ERR_OFFSET + 4)  /* Input buffer full */
00174 #define PSCIP_DSP_ERR      (PSCIP_ERR_OFFSET + 5)  /* Dsp stopped */
00175 #define PSCIP_LINK_ERR     (PSCIP_ERR_OFFSET + 6)  /* Link is down */
00176 #define PSCIP_TX_ERR       (PSCIP_ERR_OFFSET + 7)  /* Transmission error */
00177 #define PSCIP_PARAM_ERR    (PSCIP_ERR_OFFSET + 8)  /* Parameter error */
00178 #define PSCIP_BUS_ERR      (PSCIP_ERR_OFFSET + 9) /* VME bus error */
00179 
00180 #define PSCIP_SIZE_MSG  80
